choose.when: INSERT INTO TODO VALUES( TODO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 0, #{title}, #{note}, 1, TO_DATE(#{strdeadline},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{priority}, 0 )
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO TODO VALUES( TODO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 0, #{title}, #{note}, 0, NULL, #{priority}, 0 )

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TODO ORDER BY VSEQ ASC
SELECT * FROM TODO WHERE DEADABLE=1 AND SYSDATE > DEADLINE AND COMPLETE=0 ORDER BY VSEQ ASC

choose.when: UPDATE TODO SET TITLE=#{title}, NOTE=#{note}, DEADABLE=1, DEADLINE=TO_DATE(#{strdeadline},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), PRIORITY=#{priority}, COMPLETE=#{complete} WHERE NO=#{no}
choose.otherwise: UPDATE TODO SET TITLE=#{title}, NOTE=#{note}, DEADABLE=0, DEADLINE=NULL, PRIORITY=#{priority}, COMPLETE=#{complete} WHERE NO=#{no}

mapper.update: UPDATE TODO SET VSEQ=#{vseq} WHERE NO=#{no}
